s0001: Emperor Wu was the middle son of Emperor Jing.
s0003: Emperor Jing ascended the throne in the fourth year, established him as King of Jiaodong.
s0004: Emperor Jing ascended the throne in the seventh year, deposed Crown Prince Li as Linjiang King, established Jiaodong King as crown prince.
s0005: Emperor Jing died in the sixteenth year, the crown prince ascended the throne as Emperor Wu.
s0006: Emperor Wu initially ascended the throne, especially respected the sacrifices to ghosts and spirits.
s0007: In the first year, the Han had already risen over sixty years, the world was peaceful and secure, the scholars and nobles all hoped the emperor would perform the Feng and Shan sacrifices and change the calendar and degrees.
s0008: And the emperor tended toward Confucian learning, recruited worthy and upright, Zhao Wan, Wang Zang and others became nobles through literature, wished to discuss ancient matters to establish the Mingtang south of the city, to receive feudal lords there.
s0009: Drafting the matters of patrolling and hunting, Feng and Shan sacrifices, changing the calendar, clothes, colors had not yet been completed.
s0010: It happened that Empress Dowager Dou practiced the teachings of Huang-Lao, disliked Confucian learning, had people secretly obtain Zhao Wan and others' cases of taking bribes and favoritism, summoned and investigated Wan and Zang, Wan and Zang committed suicide, all the things they had started were abolished.
s0011: After six years, Empress Dowager Dou died.
s0012: In the next year, the emperor summoned literary scholars Gongsun Hong and others.
s0013: In the next year, the emperor first went to Yong, offered sacrifices seeing the five altars.
s0014: Afterwards, regularly once every three years offered sacrifices.
s0015: At this time the emperor sought the divine lord, placed him in the Houshi Pavilion of Shanglin Gardens.
s0016: The divine lord was a woman from Changling, who died grieving for her child, thus saw spirits in the former residences of her husband.
s0017: The residences of her husband sacrificed to her, the people greatly went to sacrifice.
s0018: The Pingyuan Lord went to sacrifice, his descendants afterwards became eminent through honor.
s0019: And when Emperor Wu ascended the throne, he richly honored and placed sacrifices in the inner court, heard his words, but did not see his person.
s0020: At this time Li Shaojun also appeared before the emperor through sacrificing to the stove, grain way, and avoiding old age methods, the emperor honored him.
s0021: Shaojun was a former descendant of the Marquis of Shenze, who served as an official.
s0022: He concealed his age and birthplace, always claimed to be seventy, could make things, avoid old age.
s0023: He traveled with his methods among the feudal lords.
s0025: People heard he could make things and not die, moreover gave him money and goods, constantly more than enough gold and silk clothes food.
s0026: People all considered him not managing property yet wealthy, moreover did not know what he lived on, became even more convinced, contended to serve him.
s0027: Shaojun was good at methods, skillful at making extraordinary things strike the mark.
s0028: Once drank with the Marquis of Wuan, among the guests was a ninety-year-old man, Shaojun said he had shot with his grandfather's place, the old man as a child had followed his grandfather and knew the place, one table all astonished.
s0029: Shaojun saw the emperor, the emperor had an ancient bronze vessel, asked Shaojun.
s0030: Shaojun said: 'This vessel was offered in the tenth year of Duke Huan of Qi.'
s0031: Afterwards, checked its engraving, indeed Duke Huan of Qi's vessel.
s0032: One palace all terrified, considered Shaojun a divine being, several hundred years old person.
s0033: Shaojun spoke to the emperor saying: 'Sacrificing to the stove brings things, bringing things and cinnabar can be transformed into gold, gold made into drinking vessels then increases longevity, increasing longevity and the Penglai immortals in the sea can be seen, seeing them to perform Feng and Shan then does not die, the Yellow Emperor is like this.'
s0034: He said: 'I once traveled on the sea, saw Anqi Sheng, ate dates from him, large as melons.'
s0035: Anqi Sheng was an immortal, communicated with Penglai, when united then seen by people, when not united then hidden.
s0036: Thereupon the emperor began to personally sacrifice to the stove, and sent fangshi into the sea to seek Penglai Anqi Sheng and the like, and matters transformed cinnabar and such into gold began.
s0037: After a long time, Li Shaojun fell ill and died.
s0038: The emperor considered him to have transformed and gone, not dead, and had Huang Hammer official Kuan Shu receive his methods.
s0039: Seeking Penglai Anqi Sheng could not be obtained, and the fangshi of Yan and Qi between the seas more imitated each other, again spoke of divine matters.
s0040: The man from Bo, Bo Jiyi, memorialized sacrificing to Taiyi by one method, saying: 'Heavenly gods honor Taiyi, Taiyi's assistant is called the five emperors.'
s0041: Ancient kings with spring and autumn sacrificed to Taiyi in the southeast suburb, used great livestock tools, seven days, made altar opened eight paths for ghosts.
s0042: Thereupon the emperor ordered the Supreme Scribe establish his sacrifice in the southeast suburb of Chang'an, constantly honored sacrifice as Jiyi's method.
s0043: Afterwards people submitted memorials saying 'Ancient kings three years used great livestock tools sacrificed to gods three: heaven one, earth one, Taiyi one'.

s0056: In the next year, the man from Qi Shao Weng appeared before the emperor with ghost and spirit methods.

s0058: Thereupon then appointed Shao Weng as Literary General, rewards very many, treated him with guest rites.
